documents.document:
Casting calls for ABC Family series pilot 'Phys Ed'



Actress and model Kate Lang Johnson stars as beautiful high school teacher Janie.
Creative Commons

Prodco is in pre-production on a new comedy series pilot for ABC Family called "Phys Ed", and auditions are taking place for series regulars, guest stars, and day players. Extras will be cast throughout production which begins in November, 2012. Roles for teachers, parents, and students are being cast in Los Angeles, with some additional casting done in New York. Especially needed are people 18 and older who can play high school age to work as extras on the show. Shooting will take place in Los Angeles.

Details Here:

Auditions and Casting Calls for ABC Family's "Phys Ed"

'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn' Auditions and Casting

The much anticipated casting and auditions process for "The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn" is now underway. Principal actor casting is taking place in Los Angeles, as well as 'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn' filming locations of Baton Rouge, Louisiana and Vancouver, British Columbia.

Details Here:

'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn' Auditions and Casting Calls

20th Century Fox extras casting call for 'The Big Valley'

Filming begins the first week of August, 2010 on the 20th Century Fox feature film 'The Big Valley' in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. The extras casting company in Louisiana is currently casting Baton Rouge area people to appear in the film as background actors.

Details Here:

The Big Valley Extras Casting

Summit Entertainment hiring crew/extras for 'Breaking Dawn



The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn will be shooting in Baton Rouge, Louisiana this Fall, 2010. Summit Entertainment is crewing up for the shoot and casting extras to appear in the film, and they want to hire local Baton Rouge area locals. The production company has formed a Limited Liability Corporation in Louisiana to take advantage of the State's tax breaks.

Details Here:

Breaking Dawn Extras Casting and Crew Calls

Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami casting for new 'Dash Dolls



The E! Entertainment Television hit reality television series 'Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami' is currently casting new employees to work at the Kardashian Sister's retail store DASH in Miami and be the next 'Dash Dolls". To be considered, you should not be camera shy and you must feel comfortable having your life televised.

Details Here:

Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami Casting Call

Millennium Films epic feature 'The Iceman' casting process



Bleiberg Entertainment has teamed up with Nu Image and Millennium Films to produce the upcoming feature film "The Iceman", starring the talented trio of Michael Shannon, Benicio Del Toro, and James Franco. The movie tells the true story of Richard Kuklinski.

Details Here:

Millennium Films The Iceman Auditions

Open casting call for feature film 'Mr. Poppers Penguins'



Central Casting is holding an Open Casting Call for Extras in their office located in New York, NY. They are currently casting background actors for Gossip Girl and the upcoming Jim Carrey movie, Mr. Popper’s Penguins. SAG, AFTRA and Non-Union Actors are all welcome.

Details Here:

Central Casting Open Casting Call

Television cop drama 'Detroit 1-8-7' seeking extras



The new ABC crime drama series Detroit 1-8-7 is casting extras in the Detroit metro area to work on the show this fall. The series extras casting director in Detroit is seeking all types of people.

Details Here:

Detroit 1-8-7 Extras Casting

ABC Family auditions and casting information for new series



Dark Toy Entertainment is the production company behind the new upcoming ABC Family series "Strut". The series will be part of a trio of new shows that the network is adding to it's lineup. Casting is underway for the series regulars and recurring roles.

Details Here:

ABC Family Strut Auditions

New ABC Family drama 'Switched at Birth' casting underway



“Switched at Birth,” a new one-hour scripted drama for ABC Family is currently casting the series regulars and recurring roles for the show. ABC Family is coming off another summer of record ratings, and adding depth to it's programming is one of the network's biggest priorities going into next year.

Details Here:

ABC Family 'Switched at Birth' Auditions

The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn casting Ticuna Indians



Several roles for Ticuna Indians, a South American Tribe, are being cast for The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn. Ticuna people, also known as Tukuna, reside in the Brazilian Amazon rain forest near the borders of Peru and Colombia. In character they are frank, honest, and of affectionate disposition.

Details Here:

The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Auditions

Is 'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1' casting ext



A report has come in on October 16, 2010 that there have been sightings of Robert Pattinson and company shooting scenes for "The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1" on a closed film set near Brays Point, Oregon. The report claims extras are being cast to work on the film.

Details Here:

The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn filming in Oregon

Oxygen's 'The Glee Project' Season 2 open casting calls



Although Oxygen Media has not made an official announcement that "The Glee Project" has been picked up for a second season, the hugely popular reality show has announced open casting call cities and begins accepting online video auditions. The reason Oxygen has not officially stated that "The Glee Project" has the green light for season two, is because the series "Glee" has not officially been picked up for a season 4. It is widely accepted that "Glee" will be given a pick up for a fourth season.

Details Here:

"The Glee Project" Open Casting Calls and Online Auditions

Acting Auditions

New reality show pilot seeking Moms and their aspiring Child



Does your child want to be a big star like Dakota and Elle Fanning?
Creative Commons

A brand new reality show pilot is currently accepting submissions from moms who have a male or female child that is an aspiring actor. The show will center on the mother and child, giving the participants an amazing opportunity for exposure and guidance to help the child become a successful film, television, or commercial actor. The age range for the child is 7 - 14 years old, and the mother must be fully engaged and completely supportive of their child's dream of becoming a successful actor. Moms should be approximately mis-20's to mid-40's. Any ethnicity can submit.

Details Here:

Seeking Moms and Aspiring Child Actors

Disney open casting call for 'McFarland' supporting roles

Walt Disney Pictures in association with Mayhem Pictures are set to begin shooting the feature film "McFarland" in the San Joaquin Valley, California area beginning January, 2012. The casting director is seeking athletic Hispanic men ages 17 to 23 with running experience to recreate an authentic realism of McFarland High Cougars's 1990's cross-country team, who became unlikely 9-time California champions. An open casting call is scheduled in Bakersfield, CA on December 17, 2011.

Details Here:

Disney Open Casting Call

Stephenie Meyer's 'The Host' casting calls in Louisiana



The long awaited film adaptation of Twilight series author Stephenie Meyer's "The Host" is now ready to begin shooting in February, 2012 and casting directors are holding auditions in Los Angeles and Louisiana for co-starring and supporting roles. Casting will also take place in New Orleans and Baton Rouge for day player roles, extras, stand-ins, and photo-doubles for the film's stars. "The Host" novel was a #1 New York Times Best Seller, and remained on the list for 26 weeks.

Details Here:

Stephenie Meyer's "The Host" Casting Calls

2012 Auditions for 'America's Best Dance Crew'



Click the above image to download an auditions flyer and help spread the news!
Courtesy of ABDC talent producer Lacy Forrest

MTV and Warner Horizon Television have announced the open casting call dates for season seven of the hit competitive dance reality television series "Randy Jackson Presents: America's Best Dance Crew". During the month of January, 2012 auditions will be held in Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, and Houston. Video taped submissions will also be accepted for dance crews that can not attend one of the open auditions.

Details Here:

America's Best Dance Crew Season 7 Auditions

Auditions for 'Spring Breakers' with James Franco



James Franco stars with Disney Beauties Selena Gomez and Vanessa Hudgens.
Creative Commons

The upcoming independent dark teen comedy feature film "Spring Breakers" is currently auditioning actors in Los Angeles for lead roles and supporting roles. Smaller roles and extras will be cast in Florida where shooting will take place beginning in February, 2012. The movie is about four female college students who attempt to pay for their spring break trip by robbing a restaurant, and end up getting busted. Academy Award nominated actor James Franco plays a rapping drug dealer who bails the girls out and persuades them to help him kill his rival dealer.

Details Here:

Casting and Auditions for Feature Film "Spring Breakers"

Disney Casting Calls for 'The Lone Ranger' scheduled for M



Gore Verbinski will once again direct Johnny Depp in Disney's "The Lone Ranger".
Creative Commons

Jerry Bruckheimer Films and Walt Disney Pictures have begun principal photography on the star studded feature film "The Lone Ranger". Shooting is taking place in New Mexico, Colorado, and Utah through July 20, 2012. The casting director is seeking Caucasian men and women, Native American men, and Asian men to work as extras. Open casting calls are scheduled for March and April, 2012 in Colorado and Utah. New Mexico open casting calls have already taken place.

Details Here:

Disney Casting Calls for "The Lone Ranger" in Colorado and Utah

Open casting call for 'Pain and Gain' from 'Transformers



Michael Bay has cast another world class beauty in Israel born actress Bar Paly.
Creative Commons

The Paramount Pictures star studded major comedy thriller feature film "Pain and Gain" is beginning production April 6th in Miami, FL and an open casting call is scheduled for all types of people ages 18 and over who are interested in working as extras on the film. The story is based on true events surrounding a group of bodybuilders who engage in a campaign of kidnapping, extortion and murder in Florida during 1994. Also needed are vehicles from that era, any color, make or model.

Details Here:

Paramount Pictures Open Casting Call for "Pain and Gain"

2012 U.S. Auditions and Open Casting Calls for Universal St

Universal Studios Singapore is a theme park located within Resorts World Sentosa on Sentosa Island, Singapore and features cutting-edge rides, shows and attractions based on your favorite blockbuster films and television series. The United Stated auditions team is seeking top talent for their shows. Open casting calls are scheduled for Los Angeles, Chicago, and Orlando in late April, 2012. Universal Studios is the parent company of Universal Pictures.

Details Here:

2012 Universal Studios Singapore Open Casting Calls

Disney Channel casting starring roles for new comedy series



It's a Laugh Productions made huge stars of actresses such as Miley Cyrus.
Creative Commons

It's a Laugh Productions is in pre-production on a brand new multicamera family comedy series pilot for Disney Channel titled "Bits & Pieces". The casting directors are auditioning actors to play the Fickman/Sullenger family, which includes two adults and four kids ages 7 - 16 years, two girls and two boys. All of the extras and stand-ins will be hired in Los Angeles throughout shooting which will take place this Summer, 2012. "Bits & Pieces" is a unique re-imagining of the traditional family comedy. The series will showcase the bits and pieces of a family's funniest moments using quick, dynamic storylines that unfold through a series of short comedic vignettes.

Details Here:

Disney Channel Casting New Series "Bits & Pieces"

Disney Channel casting starring roles for new series 'Fanta



From the producers of "Wizards of Waverly Place" starring Selena Gomez.
Creative Commons

Auditions for the brand new Disney Channel half-hour comedy sitcom pilot "Fantasma" are now underway for the series regulars. Casting is taking place in Los Angeles, where the show will be videotaped. Both union and non-union extras will be hired when shooting begins in July, 2012. The storyline follows a family that moves into an old house, and they soon discover that there is a perky teenage girl already living there - and she just so happens to be a ghost!

Details Here:

Disney Channel Casting "Fantasma" Starring Roles

http://i92.photobucket.com/albums/l37/theBULLDOGfan/SelenaGomez300px-2.jpg
